description:
Great idea, and very excited to see this work! Unfortunately, with Ubuntu desktop 18.04, it does not run at all.

I have LAMP installed, so that is not it, it is also a fresh build with all the updates - so that is not it. I will keep checking as I really hope this is able to work some day!
summary: Will not run - opens in read only edit mode

description: Does not work on Ubuntu 20.04, when launching the program, it launches a script in Gedit.

Okay, the kubuntu menu has a problem starting the SMonitor. 

But if you go to /snap/smonitor/??/bin/ and start the script named monitor the SMonitor itself will work as expected. 

(?? is the number on your system, mine is /snap/smonitor/10/bin/)

summary: was ist denn das für ein Schrott
